name: Five Nights At Freddy's in Unity
name_original: Five Nights At Freddy's in Unity
description:
This is a Five Night's At Freddy's recreation made in Unity. 

If you just want to read game information, skip to the last paragraph. Otherwise, keep reading! This is my second ever originally coded, complete game.  I made this game to practice making horror games. 

Every gameplay mechanic and AI were made completely by me. However, animatronic models were made by Thudner and the pirate cove model was made by RynFox. All sound effect were created by Scott Cawthon. Also, some art was by Scott Cawthon.

Controls: 

E to interact (Monitor on desk and all buttons are intractable)

WASD to move

If you find any bugs or have any suggestions, let me know! I'm happy to update this game. I have not had much testing, so if the game is too easy or too hard let me know and I can always update it.
